Name: No. 21
TalkText: The spaceship has been... destroyed.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: What is this place? The weird purple... The smell of uncertainty.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Captain and Noctis are not here.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I have to find a way out of here to get my treasure.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: ...Captain?

Name: Vera
TalkText: Too slow.

Name: Vera
TalkText: It seems you still don't know what's going on.

Name: Vera
TalkText: There's no time for hesitation.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Captain...

Name: Vera
TalkText: Do whatever you wanna do. Don't waste your time here.

Name: Vera
TalkText: I won't give you orders. You decide what to do.

Name: Vera
TalkText: This is your story.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Got it. I'll lead this time.

Name: Noctis
TalkText: You are finally here. I almost fell asleep.

Name: Noctis
TalkText: Tsk, why don't I have a cooler identity?

Name: Noctis
TalkText: Nah, whatever. Now it's time to kill!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: First of all, I'm the leader. Noctis needs to join my team and follow my orders.

Name: Noctis
TalkText: Why?! Why don't you show me how much you want me in?

Name: Noctis
TalkText: Bring it on!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Noctis is weak.

Name: Noctis
TalkText: Don't get cocky. I was going easy on you, y'know.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Hmm, no discord no concord. I've read stories like this.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: And, we're supposed to bump fists at sunset. But if it's Noctis, I think I'll pass.

Name: Noctis
TalkText: Huh? You still wanna fight? Alright, alright, let's continue!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I haven't lost my mind. I know the priorities. Time to go.

Name: Noctis
TalkText: Hey!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: ...Enemy?!

Name: Pale Phantom
TalkText: You... shouldn't be here.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Enemy on the planet...

Name: Pale Phantom
TalkText: Whoever comes here... needs to be eliminated.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I'll tear everything up, including the phantoms!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I won't be confused by these memories.

Name: Pale Phantom
TalkText: ...Is that so?

Name: Pale Phantom
TalkText: What you're looking for is not here. This planet has gone on the wrong path. It's my duty to correct it.

Name: Pale Phantom
TalkText: As a reward for defeating me, I will escort you out of here this one time.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: What about you?
The phantom falls silent.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: ...I will keep moving.
—The second planet the wolf cub visited. It's covered under the white snow and blue ice all year round, boundless, silent, and cold.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: It's so cold...

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Could there be treasure here?

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: Yawn... What can I do for you?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: We're looking for treasure.

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: We don't have that here.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Then I'll have a look ahead.

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: I'm sorry... I don't care what you want. I can't let you pass. It's dangerous ahead.

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: To get frozen in the cold snowfield and killed by the pirates in space or go back and stay somewhere safe is up to your choice.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: This is not my destination. I decide whether to go or not.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I will not go back.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: ...Rargh!

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: Hmm, that's enough. Just go...

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Why did you stop?

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: Ah... Because it's not necessary to fight anymore.

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: Since you're not afraid of the danger ahead, I have no reason to stop you.

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: But the planet has nothing but ice. What you want is not here. If you want to keep going, find the unicorn on the snowfield.

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: She will tell you what to do.

Name: White Strike Hawk
TalkText: I'm drained... I need to rest.

Name: Red Gray Raven
TalkText: Where is... the treasure...?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: A red... gray raven? She just mentioned the treasure.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: It's said that ravens always hide their treasure away...

Name: Red Gray Raven
TalkText: Who's there?!

Name: Red Gray Raven
TalkText: ...I think you misunderstood.

Name: Red Gray Raven
TalkText: My treasure... is my friends. I was guarding a bright star with two other ravens like me.

Name: Red Gray Raven
TalkText: But we got separated due to an accident. I've been looking for them.

Name: Red Gray Raven
TalkText: Please take this.

Name: Red Gray Raven
TalkText: In case you see them, please hand it to them.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Okay.

Name: Red Gray Raven
TalkText: As for the unicorn, she is not far away from here.

Name: Red Gray Raven
TalkText: Well then, I hope you'll find what you're looking for.
No. 21 explained why she came here to visit the dignified unicorn.

Name: Purple Unicorn
TalkText: You want a way out of here?

Name: Purple Unicorn
TalkText: Show me what you can do first.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Huh?

Name: Purple Unicorn
TalkText: I'm the guard of the planet. If you can't defeat me, you don't have the ability to leave the planet.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I'll prove my strength to you!

Name: Purple Unicorn
TalkText: ...You're qualified.

Name: Purple Unicorn
TalkText: In this case, I'll stick to my promise and help get out of here.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: The treasure I look for is not here...

Name: Purple Unicorn
TalkText: Leave for the closest planet around here. There is an all-capable merchant there. Perhaps he can help you find what you want.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Why are you staying here since there's nothing to guard?

Name: Purple Unicorn
TalkText: Because my friends are here. We had a promise, which for me... is the most precious treasure.
—The unicorn threw out a javelin as big as the smallest spaceship. The wolf cub clung to it, traveling through the dangerous asteroid belt and arriving on the third planet.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: So much sand...

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I could be swallowed. Need to be careful.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Hmm... It's sand everywhere. (Shakes)

Name: Desert Merchant
TalkText: Welcome to the planet.

Name: Desert Merchant
TalkText: What can I help you with?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I'm looking for the treasure that can make me stronger.

Name: Desert Merchant
TalkText: Searching for related items... Here are the items that match your needs.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: What are these?

Name: Desert Merchant
TalkText: This fits in your requirement of "getting stronger." Our items are very popular on this planet.

Name: Desert Merchant
TalkText: You can try it out if you're worried about the quality.

Name: Desert Merchant
TalkText: ...Please get ready.

Name: Desert Merchant
TalkText: ...Oh, I screwed up.

Name: Desert Merchant
TalkText: Then, please pay for the weapon you damaged just now. It should be...
The desert merchant indicates a number with his fingers.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I only believe in the power of my claws.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: This "power" seems weird. It's not what I want.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Bye.

Name: Desert Merchant
TalkText: What is the true "power"...?

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: It's Oasis territory. Unidentified people are not allowed to go there. Show me your token.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Token? I don't have any token.

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: You have to defeat me if you insist on going in.

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: Someone, lock this stranger up in the jail.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Fight or get caught...!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Pant... Pant...

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: ...You're more daring than I imagined.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I've defeated many enemies. All fierce machines. So I'm strong... and I can still fight.
Something falls from No. 21.

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: Why do you have this?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I promised a red gray raven to give it to her friends. Give it back to me!

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: So you're not working for the Guardian of the Ruins... This is a mistake. The gray raven is my ally. Please accept my apology.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Mmm... The Guardian of the Ruins?

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: ...The Guardian of the Ruins is the ruler of the planet, a militant who turned this green planet into what it is.

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: My job is to bring the oasis back to this planet... For me, Oasis residents' happiness is the most precious treasure.

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: But the war will never end as long as the Guardian of the Ruins is still here.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Green is the color of the forest. I like it. I saw some greenness on my way... but not much. The planet is full of sand. I don't like it.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Where I came from is full of greenness. It's tough, so there can be greenness as well.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I can help you kill the bad guy who ruined the greenness. Lead the way.

Name: Oasis Leader
TalkText: Thank you for your help.

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: I... want war!

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: So you're the one who has been messing up my planet... How ignorant!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Now a prey has appeared... I won't let it go easily.

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: Hahaha, prey? Come out, my reliable subordinates!

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: Now let's see who's the prey and who's the hunter?

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: Arghhh!

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: Why are you running away? Get back! Help!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: There's no escape. I will tear you up.

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: You win! You win! P-please spare me... No more wars, I swear! I was blinded...

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: Please spare me. I can give you whatever you want.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I'm looking for a treasure. Do you know where it is?

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: A treasure? There is a treasure...

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: There is a planet far away from here... The last ruler of that planet might have what you want.

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: However, it's far away from here. And there's a dangerous place on the way.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I have nothing to fear with my claws and friends.

Name: Guardian of the Ruins
TalkText: Ugh—! This is the map to that planet! Please keep your claws away from you.

—The wolf cub's spaceship collapsed upon arrival like a potato chip that has been put away for too long in the high temperature. Here lava is boiling forever. This is the fourth planet the cub visits.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: It's hot.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: The spaceship... has stopped?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Have to find a new one.
The Blast Rabbit stamps its foot in anger and doesn't notice the wolf cub around it.

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: Why are the collectors I left on the way all damaged?

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: Ahh! I have to start over again. If I find out who did it...

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Mmm, what's the smell...?

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: You did this?

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: ...Stop right there!

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: It's impossible. You can't beat me...

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I'll get stronger in the story.

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: What does that mean...? Never mind. Let's fight. I'm not sure if you were the one who destroyed the device.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: You can smell that too?

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: No! You won't leave traces like these. Just have a look.

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: Cough, sorry.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: No need to apologize. I didn't do it, but I can help you fix it. I'm quite good at it.

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: No need to do that. The fact that it's damaged means that the material is not strong enough! I'd rather start over.

Name: Blast Rabbit
TalkText: Hmm, this time I'm gonna adjust the proportions of metals... This is better. Just two more blasting experiments...
The Blast Rabbit is lost in work.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Hm, just keep moving.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Is this a blue gray raven? (Sniffs) Yes. They smell similar.
The blue gray raven stays still.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: No, the smell... is a trap!
One blue gray raven is down, but another blue gray raven comes up.

Name: Blue Gray Raven
TalkText: I can't believe that you've seen through my trap. It seems that the test model is not qualified... What brought you here?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: The red gray raven asked me to give it to you. She was looking for her kind. I could smell it.

Name: Blue Gray Raven
TalkText: Now I see... I am one of the Gray Raven members.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Then why don't you go back?

Name: Blue Gray Raven
TalkText: ...I've got other business to attend to. Our star won't be truly saved until I finish it, so I have to stay.

Name: Blue Gray Raven
TalkText: Thank you for the update on my teammates. In return, I would like to offer you anything you need.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I need a spaceship to this planet.
No. 21 takes out the map given by the Guardian of the Ruins to show the blue gray raven.

Name: Blue Gray Raven
TalkText: But this planet... No, I see, this is a spaceship launcher. The shipyard is not far from here.

Name: Bad Guy
TalkText: (Sobs) H-help me... I'm just a humble captain whose spaceship and food were taken away by the pirates...

Name: No. 21
TalkText: (The smell... The Guardian of the Ruins and the damaged device also had it.)

Name: No. 21
TalkText: You smell lies. I don't believe you.

Name: Bad Guy
TalkText: Oops...

Name: Bad Guy
TalkText: Smart cub. But what can I do?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Rargh—!

Name: Bad Guy
TalkText: Ouch... It hurts.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I'll rip you apart with my next strike...!

Name: Bad Guy
TalkText: Not really. "Blah, blah, blah"!
The bad guy utters a spell that No. 21 doesn't understand.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: ...Hmm! I can't move... Why...?

Name: Bad Guy
TalkText: Buddy, you are brave and strong, but you're not gonna help you survive on the planet.

Name: Bad Guy
TalkText: Each story features a charming villain, so... I'll have the spaceship.

Name: Bad Guy
TalkText: However, as a kind captain, I can consider giving you a lift.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: ... Hmm.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: That guy got away with it this time... I won't let him go next time.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Let's continue onward.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: Are these... cakes?

Name: Artist
TalkText: Heh... art pieces...

Name: No. 21
TalkText: The planet smells... (sniffs) sweet.

Name: Artist
TalkText: Wait. You're about to step on my work.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I see.

Name: Artist
TalkText: Careful! You just stepped on another one!

Name: Artist
TalkText: Ahh! My great work!

Name: Artist
TalkText: U-unforgivable...

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I was just walking...

Name: Artist
TalkText: Hehe... Hehe... I see...

Name: Artist
TalkText: The cakes are broken... The mixed color looks unique!

Name: Artist
TalkText: This beauty of chaos... This random surprise... is freedom itself...

Name: Artist
TalkText: Surging inspiration... I see. What I did was wrong!

Name: Artist
TalkText: This time... My taste in art will finally be recognized! I am the best artist on this planet!

Name: Artist
TalkText: Hehe... Freedom... Freedom...

Name: No. 21
TalkText: This guy is crazy...

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: Huff puff! Haha!

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: You're finally here! Nanami... Ahem! The best warrior in the universe has been waiting for you for a long time!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I don't remember this character...

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: Hmm, every story needs an Easter egg character...

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: Well then, after a series of struggles, here comes the critical moment when the main characters fight the boss.

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: ...Standing in front of you is the best warrior in the universe!

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: Boo— I got defeated!

Name: No. 21
TalkText: The warrior is a bad actor...

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: Ahem, well, now that you have defeated the best warrior in the universe, you just need to pay a little price to possess the power to fight the final Boss.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: ...What "price"?

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: Give up something that's very important to you in return for something that's more important.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I won't give up freedom or my friends.

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: Phew... Cool. Now that's the response of a warrior!

Name: The Best Warrior in the Universe
TalkText: Well then... I have nothing more to teach you. Just keep going.

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Are you here to make friends with me?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I heard that you had a treasure...

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Treasure? You're standing on it! The paradise we live in! That's my treasure!

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Stay here and play with us!

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Claws... fangs, and other scary things are not needed here. Make yourself adorable and play with us!

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Let's play?

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Woo—!
Defeated, the Gingerbread King sits on the ground and starts crying.

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Why don't you wanna play with me? This is the paradise I created... Only the softness and sweetness. No horrible, painful memories. Isn't it good?

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: ...Did I do anything wrong?

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Everyone loves sweet things... So I turned the planet sweet...

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Everyone is looking for the treasure, so I give it to them. And they will play with me...

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: Is there anything wrong with it?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I don't know, but now I understand that "treasure" is just a name.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: What I want is not here. The "treasure" everyone wants is different.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: And I've already gotten my treasure... It's just I hadn't realized until then.

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: I'm confused.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: It's okay. I spent a lot of time to figure it out. No worries. You'll understand it one day.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: I learned this from my friends. Someone will teach you this as long as you keep moving.

Name: Gingerbread King
TalkText: But isn't this already the end of the story?

Name: No. 21
TalkText: No.
The wolf cub shakes its head.

Name: No. 21
TalkText: My story will not end.
